name: couscous saykouk
ingredients: Barley semolina (Belboula) or fine semolina (quantity unspecified)
steps: In a large dish, put the semolina and sprinkle it with a large glass of warm water. Let it rest for a while to absorb.
Separate the grains by mixing with your hands.
Place the semolina in the top part of the couscoussier. Steam for 30 minutes (first cooking).
Remove to the dish, add salt, and sprinkle with water. Aerate and let it rest to fully absorb the water.
Steam a second time for 15 minutes.
Remove from heat and pour into the dish, mixing in the butter.
Shape the semolina into a cone in a dish and serve immediately with fermented milk (Lben) or buttermilk.
